# Other Resources

Here are a collection of previous and ongoing webinar series I helped co-host as a collaborative effort between the [Statistical Ecology section](https://www.esa.org/stats/) of the Ecological Society of America (ESA) and the [Ecological Forecasting Initiative (EFI)](https://ecoforecast.org).

-   [Statistical Methods Seminar Series](https://ecoforecast.org/workshops/statistical-methods-seminar-series/) (2021 - present)
-   [Taking Your R Shiny Apps To The Next Level](https://ecoforecast.org/workshops/r-shiny-seminar-series/) (2021)
